trips.aboutD:
Embark on a fascinating journey from Alexandria to Cairo, 
where history and modernity blend seamlessly. Explore the 
majestic Pyramids, immerse yourself in the rich Egyptian 
culture at the Egyptian Museum, and wander through the 
bustling Khan El Khalili Bazaar. This short trip promises a 
delightful mix of ancient wonders and vibrant city life.
trips.Rules:
1- Please gather at the designated meeting point at least   15 minutes before the departure time.

2- Ensure that you have your valid identification documents, such as passports or identification cards, with you.

3- Listen carefully to the instructions provided by the tour guide or organizer.

4- Board the designated vehicle or mode of transportation and find a comfortable seat.

5- Fasten your seatbelts and listen to any safety briefings provided by the driver or tour guide.

6- During the journey, please refrain from loud conversations or disruptive behavior that may disturb other participants.

7- If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to approach the tour guide or organizer for assistance.

8- Enjoy the scenic views along the way, but refrain from opening the windows without permission.

9- Stay seated while the vehicle is in motion and avoid unnecessary movement that may affect the balance or safety of the vehicle.

10- Follow any rest or meal break schedules provided by the tour guide.

11- Respect the environment and dispose of any waste in designated trash bins.

12- Upon arrival in Cairo, follow the instructions of the tour guide regarding disembarkation and group activities.

13- Stay together as a group and avoid wandering off without informing the tour guide.

14- Take note of the meeting point and time for the return journey to Alexandria.

15- Enjoy your time in Cairo, follow the tour itinerary, and make the most of your visit to the city's attractions.
